refnamediv.para: This page lists all the functions to manipulate Cell objects.

refsection.literal:
scilabVar
scilab_createCellMatrix(
scilabEnv
env, int dim, const int* dims)
refsection.para: Create a cell matrix with dim dimensions (dims[0], dims[1], ..., dims[dim-1]).

refsection.literal:
scilabVar
scilab_createCellMatrix2d(
scilabEnv
env, int row, int col)
refsection.para: Create a cell matrix with 2 dimensions (row, col).
